trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> 類別之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> 事件的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method of a membership provider is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>呼叫方法的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event to validate password formats and values for membership users.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，以驗證密碼格式和成員資格使用者的值。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消目前<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>藉由設定動作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`期間<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`, you can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由設定取消目前動作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>描述密碼驗證失敗之原因的例外狀況的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫方法將會擲回例外狀況，<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性設定為。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性是`null`，呼叫端將會擲回一般密碼驗證失敗的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，它會驗證使用者的密碼格式取消動作，如果密碼不符合所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: The membership user name for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: 目前建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作成員使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the specified membership user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之成員使用者的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event is occurring while a new user is being created; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件是於正在建立使用者時發生，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used by a membership provider implementation in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method implementations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式使用中的成員資格提供者實作<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法實作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a sample <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A> implementation that creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs> object to pass to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示範例<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>建立新的實作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs>傳遞至物件<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否會取消目前的建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action will be canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會取消目前的建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property is used to cancel the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性用來取消目前<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>動作。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定取消目前動作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`期間<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`, you can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由設定取消目前動作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>描述密碼驗證失敗之原因的例外狀況的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫方法將會擲回例外狀況，<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性設定為。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性是`null`，呼叫端將會擲回一般密碼驗證失敗的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，它會驗證使用者的密碼格式取消動作，如果密碼不符合所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述密碼驗證失敗之原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" />，描述密碼驗證失敗的原因。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is used when the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action has been canceled by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性使用時目前<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>動作已取消設定<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性設定為描述密碼驗證失敗之原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫方法將會擲回例外狀況，<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性設定為。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性是`null`，呼叫端將會擲回一般密碼驗證失敗的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，它會驗證使用者的密碼格式取消動作，如果密碼不符合所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event is being raised during a call to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出在呼叫 <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> 方法期間是否引發 <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event is being raised during a call to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫 <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> 方法期間引發 <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> 事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The password for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: 目前建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method of a membership provider is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>呼叫方法的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event to validate password formats and values for membership users.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，以驗證密碼格式和成員資格使用者的值。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取消目前<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>藉由設定動作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`期間<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`, you can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由設定取消目前動作<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>描述密碼驗證失敗之原因的例外狀況的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫方法將會擲回例外狀況，<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性設定為。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性是`null`，呼叫端將會擲回一般密碼驗證失敗的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，它會驗證使用者的密碼格式取消動作，如果密碼不符合所需的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the membership user for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作成員使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the membership user for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: 目前建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼動作成員使用者名稱。
